title: STEM Integrated Education Design for Adult Learners with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM concepts and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Need for customized education combining language domains and STEM for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately analyze over 80% of STEM learning needs for adult learners with intellectual disabilities through peer coaching
Learners design STEM activity plans for learners with intellectual disabilities three or more times using inquiry-based learning strategies
Learners improve educational plans two or more times based on feedback from peer teachers using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
